entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow and blowing snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Blowing snow late this evening and overnight. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
